title: São Paulo Biodiversity-Health-Governance Dataset
description: Integrated dataset analyzing correlations between biodiversity, climate risks, universal access to services (UAI), and health outcomes across 645 municipalities in São Paulo State, Brazil. Supports research on the dilution effect, conservation-poverty paradox, and governance gaps.

temporalCoverage.note: Health data covers 2010-2019; UAI data from 2020-2024

dataFiles.name: 645_sin_salud.csv
dataFiles.description: Environmental and UAI data for all 645 municipalities

dataFiles.name: df_sin_cuadrantes.pkl
dataFiles.description: Main processed dataset with quadrant classification

variables.name: cod_ibge
variables.label: IBGE Municipality Code
variables.description: Official 7-digit IBGE code for Brazilian municipalities

variables.name: nome_municipio
variables.label: Municipality Name
variables.description: Official municipality name

variables.name: mean_species_richness
variables.label: Mean Species Richness
variables.description: Average number of distinct species (all taxa combined)

variables.name: Vert_rich_risk
variables.label: Vertebrate Richness Risk
variables.description: Risk index for vertebrate species richness loss

variables.name: forest_cover_pct
variables.label: Forest Cover Percentage
variables.description: Percentage of municipality area covered by native forest

variables.name: UAI_housing
variables.label: UAI - Housing
variables.description: Universal Access Index component for housing access

variables.name: UAI_env
variables.label: UAI - Environment
variables.description: Universal Access Index component for environmental services

variables.name: UAI_food
variables.label: UAI - Food Security
variables.description: Universal Access Index component for food access

variables.name: UAI_mob
variables.label: UAI - Mobility
variables.description: Universal Access Index component for transportation access

variables.name: UAI_Crisk
variables.label: UAI - Climate Risk
variables.description: Universal Access Index component for climate risk preparedness

variables.name: flooding_exposure
variables.label: Flood Exposure
variables.description: Exposure to flooding events

variables.name: flooding_risks
variables.label: Flood Risk
variables.description: Overall flood risk assessment

variables.name: hydric_stress_exp
variables.label: Water Stress Exposure
variables.description: Exposure to water scarcity conditions

variables.name: hydric_stress_risk
variables.label: Water Stress Risk
variables.description: Overall water stress risk assessment

variables.name: incidence_dengue
variables.label: Dengue Incidence
variables.description: Average annual dengue fever incidence rate

variables.name: incidence_diarrhea
variables.label: Diarrhea Incidence
variables.description: Average annual diarrheal disease incidence rate

variables.name: incidence_malaria
variables.label: Malaria Incidence
variables.description: Average annual malaria incidence rate

variables.name: incidence_leptospirosis
variables.label: Leptospirosis Incidence
variables.description: Average annual leptospirosis incidence rate

variables.name: persist_dengue
variables.label: Dengue Persistence
variables.description: Number of years (0-10) with dengue cases detected

variables.name: copersistence
variables.label: Disease Copersistence Index
variables.description: Index measuring simultaneous persistence of multiple diseases

variables.name: IVM
variables.label: Multidimensional Vulnerability Index
variables.description: Composite index integrating poverty, service access, housing, and climate vulnerability

variables.name: cuadrante
variables.label: Quadrant Classification
variables.description: Classification based on UAI (governance) and IVM (vulnerability)
variables.methodology: Median split on UAI and IVM

qualityAssurance.missingData: Complete for environmental variables; 29% coverage for health variables

relatedPublications.title: A blueprint for integrated assessment of agrifood-system burdens
